participant_1.background:

I have a cat named Sherlock who loves to watch mystery movies with me.

participant_2.background:
I think the most difficult thing I've ever done was to leave my home country and move to a new one.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.
i enjoy reading and walking on sunny days.
I live in a small town in the Midwest where I can be myself and not be judged for my music taste or my dreams.
i have went to mexico 4 times this year.

content.text: hey! I just got a new puppy and it keeps me up all night so im exhausted!
oh no that's so sad to hear! what breed is your puppy?
it's a goldendoodle. I'm going to take him to the park today so he can run around
that sounds like a lot of fun! i bet he'll have a blast playing at the park.
I hope so! I'm just worried he's going to get too hot because the weather is so hot right now.
yeah that's definitely a concern. maybe try to take him out early in the morning or later at night when it's cooler.
that's a good idea! i'll do that. thanks for the advice!
no problem! i'm always happy to help.
hey! I'm so glad I met you. you're really nice and helpful.
thank you! I'm glad to hear that. you seem really nice too!
thank you! I'm just trying my best to be a good person.
and you're doing a great job!
